website_summaries.verdict: These sturdy headrest hooks come out on top thanks to a generous weight capacity, an adjustable design, and effortless installation.
pros: Strong enough to hold up to 13 lbs
Converts to a bottle holder in seconds, offering an easy solution for large bottles or small cup holders
Side opening allows for fuss-free installation and removal
cons: More expensive than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bags/backpacks out of the floor and seats
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are awesome! I ordered them For my son to hang his backpack on when he is in the car. I also have been hanging my purse abd gymbag on them instead of just throwing them in the floor or seat. I am sure they would work great for small grocery bags and store trips as well! They are strong and sturdy and went right around the metal grip no problem! Definitely recommend them for anyone with kids or just to have to keep your car more tidy and seating available!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey J

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I think of that!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to secure grocery bags and my purse, which usually ends up on the passenger side floor with the contents spilled everywhere. Hooks are a durable, heavy-duty plastic and even comes with a separate clip that attaches to the hook for use in hanging a water bottle. I'm confused about one reviewer's comment about the clips making a 'rattling noise' and the request to make them easier to attach to the headrest. I had no problems attaching/removing them at all.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses-what are your ideas?
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and makes your car look like you care. I have one hook for my purse because where can you put your purse? It keeps it off the floor mats and no one has to hold it. I used another hook to hold a cloth small shopping bag. Why because who doesn’t need a tisdue once in a while or a small garbage bag? I added pen and paper plus a few bandaids. They are durable, movable, and have many purposes-think outside the box—like where to hang your headphones on a long trip or pair them with the luggage bungee for your kids ipad to watch a movie. Quiet kids on a trip are a real pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Rosezk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are perfect for keeping my purse from falling off the front passenger seat. It's just the right length and the heavy duty nylon fabric strap doesn't dig into my leather seat back. I love it! It can be rotated towards the back when there's someone in the passenger seat. It is in opinion the best of all the other similar products available.
customer_reviews.author: arwenabelle

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, well designed, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Working out great, bags kept falling over and spilling, now we can just hang them and have more foot room too. Using in Honda Odyssey.The top hook is nice and wide for thicker handles and the cloth part of the strap lets it sit nicely on the seat back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyusagi

customer_reviews.title: Great yet simple invention.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t you hate it when you turn a corner and your purse tips over in the seat next to you and half the contents go flying all over the floor and some of it gets wedged under the seat? Me too!!! But not anymore. I have had these for some time now and they are great!! They hold a fairly heavy purse and are so easy to use. I also like the fact that I can swing it around from the front of the seat to the back of the seat when a passenger is riding. I have even used one of the hooks to hold the diaper bag when my granddaughter is riding in the car with me.
customer_reviews.author: Oak Hills Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! Wonderful for holding my purse in my car so my stuff doesn't go flying when I make a turn... not that I drive crazy or anything... but I digress, this is an excellent product, sturdy enough to hold a heavy purse, can hold water bottles like the picture and grocery bags as well. Hook clicks around the poles of the head rest and stay secure. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M. Branch

customer_reviews.title: LOVE having these in my car for all kinds of ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE having these in my car for all kinds of shopping bags. Very substantial and strong, and easily swing around from thr back of the seat to the front for when I want to hang my purse in the passenger seat next to me. Has kept my purse from ending up on the floor many times after a quick stop!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a few different designs before settling on this type of hook. I like the way it lays flat under the headrest so that the headrest doesn't have to be elevated. I take two bags to work every day, my purse and a second that carries lunch, umbrella, laptop, etc. I am able to use both hooks one for each bag, however, the lower hook will accomodate only a smaller, thinner strap. Now, I open my back seat, pull my bags from the hook and off I go. No more fussing around to gather things up out of the back seat!
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but looks like it "melted" in hot weather
customer_reviews.text: We were doing fine with these until they were apparently in the sun, heated up enough for the head rest hook to "uncurl" with the weight of two average grocery bags on them - the hook straightened out and let go of the head rest post. I bought them because I liked the double hanger but if the hook can't take double the weight in the back of a mini van where they are likely to see sun again then the double hanger isn't really twice as useful, right?. I am ordering another set of the simple metal wire ones, I've had a set of these through two cars and without any failures.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: good for some
customer_reviews.text: The concept is nice but if you have leather seats beware, it left marks and scrapes as the car moved around and things were going from them
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit newer Volvo
customer_reviews.text: The basic concept is great and I was excited to get these, as my purse is always falling over and having everything spill out. However, I should have looked at my car before ordering! I have a year-old Volvo XC90 and these don't fit. Found out after they arrived. Have to send back. My headrest posts are very wide. Check before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and useful
customer_reviews.text: I do community based health work, so I'm in the car all day, often with someone in the passenger seat, so I really needed something to securely hold my purse and work bag, and this does the job nicely, though many of my straps are long enough that my bags hit the floor, they are easier to grab this way. The only thing I might change is making the loops bigger to hold thicker straps, and having the entire device be horizontal instead of vertical and hooking to BOTH headrest posts, with multiple hooks hanging perpendicularly.
customer_reviews.author: Mouriana

customer_reviews.title: best hooks!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hooks. They fit snuggly on the posts of headrests (honda odyssey) and don't fly around as the car moves yet you can rotate them front to back to fit your needs. They drape perfectly over the car back so they don't stick out like metal ones do. I use them on the back of the third row of my van in the cargo area to hold reusable grocery bags. I have them on the back of headrest of the front seat, to hang my purse, hang my plastic filled grocery bags, grandchildren's backpacks and coats or an umbrella ect. They really are nice.
customer_reviews.author: auntevie

customer_reviews.title: No more items rolling around in the back
customer_reviews.text: I still like the strap idea, i feel they would be more forgiving and move out of the way a bit if a back seat passenger ever came in contact with them. The straps do make it a bit harder to remove multiple plastic grocery bags since they "lift" along with the bag straps. When hung on passenger side, these are perfect for holding handbags or shopping bag or even jackets within drivers reach.
customer_reviews.author: fedgovguy

customer_reviews.title: ... had in the past these look to be the best ones yet
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased these a few days ago but of all the seat head-rest hooks I have had in the past these look to be the best ones yet. Sturdy, and hang nicely behind the front seat and are unobtrusive when getting in / out of back seat. The 4 bottle adapters that come included really work. Grandkids like their water bottle after the soccer game. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Headrest Hook
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching for this item since my friend had one in her car. so far, I'm loving it. It has a hook for my bags/purse, and an attachment to hook my water bottle on it. Don't usually have passengers in the back seat, but this would be a big plus for them. My purse drops in easily and removes easily. It seems to be durable, so hopefully it'll last and last
customer_reviews.author: Timmer

customer_reviews.title: Broke at 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the end of January. I kept two and gave the others to my mom and sister. I keep mine on the passenger seat and it’s so nice to have my purse hanging, you don’t have to worry about it falling over and spilling everything on the seat and beyond. I really had no complaints except that one of mine just broke. The plastic piece that holds the hook to the strap broke. I know my purse isn’t more than 4 pounds and the description said it could handle more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, functional car hook!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever watched your purse roll right off the passenger seat where it was resting comfortably? You see the contents of your purse jump out, roll under the seat, and your phone just disappears. NO MORE. Purchase this little hook and clip it on your headrest. Then you calmly place your purse handle over the hook. It stays put! You can also use it for grocery bags so your oranges are not discovered months later, shriveled up and moldy under your seat. Backpacks, baseball gloves, jackets can all be hooked on the back of the front seat because this useful hook swivels to the back.
customer_reviews.author: summergirl

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: i easily attached them to the headrests of two cars. the clip is pretty sturdy and does not easily fall off. these hooks made it convenient to hang a heavy diaper bag and any other misc bags. i was hoping i would be able to hang a water bottle when not carrying a bag, but the bottle neck was too small. it can only take larger water bottles. this sucks because it can't carry bottles that i buy for my son. i adapted and use it to temporarily carry other miscellaneous things, like usb charger cables, baby water cups, portable fans, ect... I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Handy Device!
customer_reviews.text: These little hangers are going to be so nice in the car. I can hang my purse and not have to worry about it flying off the seat and the contents spilling onto the floorboard below. Happens so often and it's very frustrating. Yes, I can zip my purse up so the contents don't fly out, but sometimes you don't want to zip it so you can reach for things quickly. This hanger on the passenger seat head rest post solves that problem nicely, neatly and discreetly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We used these today for the first time. The only problem we noticed has to do with the bottle holders. The problem is that they are too large to hold out bottles and the are an obstacle when trying to hang a grocery sack on the hook they cover. Incidentally, there was no indication of how to attach the bottle holders.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Headrest Hooks for a Variety of Uses
customer_reviews.text: When I have someone riding in the passenger seat my purse always ends up on the floor behind the console and it is always difficult to retrieve it when I get to my destination. When I saw these I had an "aha" moment and purchased for myself and others. It works better if the purse strap isn't too long but I really like the concept and believe it will really come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but poor design
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the idea of these hooks. They install easily and are subtle enough that they can be left on the headrest when not being used. Unfortunately 3 out of the 4 hooks broke when I hung a small and not very heavy backpack from them. The molded plastic hook has a very thin bar that goes through the nylon strap. This weak point breaks very easily. Just a poor key design element of an otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straps are not long enough or adjustable..
customer_reviews.text: I think the problems with all of the hooks, this manufacturer and others, is they are not Long enough.. if the straps were make to be adjustable, a simple fix, they would be great. My Honda Pilot has normal width seat backs and the straps do not fit all the way over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T, Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I had a little bit of a hard time getting them on the headrest posts. I have arthritic thumbs and it's hard to hold and push, so I don't know if everyone would have the same issues as me. The hooks work very well and are so handy when you've got people riding in the back seat. They can hang purses etc on them without having to take up seat and floor space. I know they will come in very handy for riders and I've already hooked things to them that I want in the back, but not necessarily on the floor or seat.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these hooks 2 days ago. Very good value for the. Only and I love that you get 4 hooks. I put one on each front seat headrests, hanging towards the back for my kids to use. I can switch the passenger one around to the front, but you do have to lift the headrest a bit and reset the position a bit- wish it was a bit easier to do that, it could just be the make of my vehicle(suburban). I gave 2 hooks to my 25 yr. old daughter and she loves them! She uses one to hold her gym bad and for now uses the other to hold a bag for trash. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Janie O.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and useful, easy to use, but a longer or adjustable strap part would be better
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to install on the back seat of an SUV so that there would be places to put grocery bags and such. Our old car had built in hooks and our newer one does not. The rear seatback top (2019 Mazda CX-5) is fairly thick, enough that these hooks won't work well. Unfortunately the strap part is rather short and not adjustable. They were great on back of the front seats though, so that is our compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lobdell

customer_reviews.title: Hang your purse and drive without a mess!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the headrest hooks for several months and love them. I have 1 hanging in the front passenger seat and 2 in the back seats. I also gave one to my daughter to use. I love them. I only have issues in getting my purse off the hook. It takes 2 hands - 1 to hold the hook down so it doesn't move and then the other to remove my purse straps. If the hook was angled outward a little more instead of straight up and down I think it would be easier to remove whatever is hanging on the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: BrookKY

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but hard to attach to my Subaru
customer_reviews.text: I have a different hook I’ve been using but decided to try these because I liked the idea of the water bottle holder/ 2 places to hang items. I also wanted additional hooks for my husbands car. First- I had trouble getting it on the headrest in my Subaru Forester but with some force, got it on. Will I be able to remove it easily? I don’t know. I haven’t had these long so I can’t comment on sturdiness yet. So far, I recommend them but know that not all cars are built the same.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These things are absolutely great! Work exactly as intended and the water bottle holder on the bottom is handy! Made of sturdy material. Using one for myself and giving the other 3 as gifts! Keeps my purse within reach when someone is in the passenger seat ... I used to put in on the arm rest between the seats and it would slide back and fall over sometimes! Would definitely recommend. I have a Dodge Journey and it fits snug on the head rest post and hangs down just fine. Absolutely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SoIl1

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my purse and husband’s cap
customer_reviews.text: Until I saw this on Amazon, didn’t realize there was something where I could hang my purse. It kept falling over in the back seat, and Never on my side of the car. The bonus for my husband was that he could hang his cap on one. His cap was always getting covered with coats and flattened on the back seat. Have only used it a week, so do not know how strong they will be. I also put my empty shopping bags, to remind me to take them into the store. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Meanjeanne

customer_reviews.title: Handy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the front passenger seat to keep my purse from flying around. Egan I have a passenger, it just flips over to the back, out of the way. I use the ones in the back seat to keep grocery bags and my lunch bag. They don't stick out far enough to pose a danger to backseat passengers in the event of a crash. Seem strong enough for what I carry. Haven't used the bottle holder, and might remove them, as I pretty much always use my Hydro Flask.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I think these will be great! They were easy to fit onto my headrest and I like the option of being able to have 4 in the package. They seem durable and are exactly what I was looking for. I hang my purse handle over the hook in the passenger seat of my car. I believe they will keep my purse in place if an unexpected quick stop should happen. I am not sure if I will use the optional water bottle holder, but it was great to have the option if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and installed them. They were very easy to install. These hooks will come in handy. It was well thought out to provide a resealable bag for hooks that I can store elsewhere in the car, so I can add more hooks as needed. Quite frankly, having too many hooks was too much. One other consideration is that if you bang your head on it, or slip your hands or hands on them while entering the vehicle, I can see where it might hurt especially a child. May need to think of a way to improve that aspect of the product. Maybe make it more smooth and less sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Eli P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: Tired of having my purse on the floor of my vehicle (especially in winter when floors are wet from snow) or my purse falling from the seat with contents strewn about, I searched for a solution. These hooks are perfect. While driving, I slip the hook to the front and hook my purse securely in the passenger seat. The headreast is not effected in the least by the hooks. With four hooks included, I have two in each of my vehicles. They lie flat (unlike some others available), so there’s no worry of them catching on something. Wonderful idea and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like these. Had a different brand that was all hard plastic and hated them. They would come loose all of the time - especially when you tried to remove a bag or something from them. Just annoying! However, these clip on tightly and have not come off at all. Also, the strap let's them hang closer to the seat, so they are only dealing with the weight pulling down.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy

customer_reviews.title: The hooks are great. I already have three friends loving them
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are great. I already have three friends loving them. They are very sturdy and so easy to use. I have my umbrella hanging from one of them. I put my handbag on one each time I enter my car. So much easier to grab it when needed, as opposed to being on the floor. Same goes for small shopping bags, which were always on the floor. My backseat passengers use them for their water bottles. Love them and would definitely recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They hold water, soda, umbrellas, my purse. Easy to put on & off.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two sets of these, one for me and one for my daughter. I keep my umbrella, bottle of water, purse, etc. on these. I hang my purse on the one behind the passenger side, I can reach it from the drivers seat and my purse is out of the way, out of view, and not laying on the front seat. Just snap them on the front seat headrests. Easy on and off. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: NancyOH44

customer_reviews.title: Works On My F150!!
customer_reviews.text: These work exceptionally well in my F150 truck. I tried other, highly rated non-flexible hooks first, but found they were way too small for my truck seats. The above car seat headrest hooks have straps attached to the hooks which allows for usage on bigger, deeper seats. The bonus water bottle holder attachments are a huge plus, and I added them to all hooks before installation. I highly recommend this product, and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: great set of hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on my Kia Sorento this week. They are holding my gym bag, my book bag, and I flipped one to the front of the passenger seat so I could hang my purse. It will easily flip to the back if I have a passenger. I am going to like these. Already recommended them to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Easy install. Hung mine on the back of the driver headrest and on the back of the backseat headrests for hooks in my "trunk". I have a crossover so my seats fold down. When up the "trunk" now has hooks. When down they are flexible and fall to the side of the headreat so they are safe. Never even thought of this use but I bought hot soup from the grocery store soup bar the other night. The kind that you always worry about spilling on the way home. Put the container in a bag. The bag hung from the hook and balanced with the turns... so no tips or spills in the car.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!! How did I live with out it????
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! I bought this because I have kids in sports and they always need a water jug. What usually happens is they don't hold them in the car, they just just set them in the floor and when I turn the thing goes flying and water leaks. I have solved the problem with this, we just hang the jug on the hook and life it great!!!! No more annoying rolling water jugs and water everywhere. Oh and I also love hanging my purse in it.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: I love that my purse no longer goes flying off the ...
customer_reviews.text: I find these so handy! I love that my purse no longer goes flying off the seat when I stop quickly. It keeps things in reach. When I have a passenger, it just swings around to the back and is still handy. I found it useful for hanging small grocery bags behind the front seat because my garage is tight and I cannot get into my SUV rear door once the garage door is closed. Good, sturdy product. I had another type of headrest hook, all plastic, and it doesn't fit as well as these do.
customer_reviews.author: sandin

customer_reviews.title: The beast of in car orginazation and auxillary storage.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few months and they are very handy. Easy to install and hold a good amount of weight. I have no complaints with the performance or installation. They came quickly with all the attachments, as advertised. I would recommend them to anyone with clean car neurosis, like myself, or for anyone that prefers to have extra in cab storage. I personally used mine for grocery shopping, and they can hold multiple loaded bags of groceries with ease. I also use them daily for carrying my gym bag and over the shoulder work satchel. I highly recommend them, they work exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hanging shopping bags.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a state where we now have to pay for bags when making a purchase at most stores. I couldn’t seem to remember to put my reusable bags in my car before going out shopping and when I did, they were always sliding around. This was a great solution. Now they are neatly hanging in my car at all times. I just have to remember to grab them before going in to the store. They are easy to use and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This products is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hooks. I do not normally leave reviews however these hooks are everything they say they are. I used them on vacation. While sitting in the backseat was able to put my soda and bottled water in the hook. My bag that held 1 hardback book and three large paperbacks as wellbas knitting and wallet was nicely handled by the hook. I am excitedxtobusecitcwhilecdrivingcsobibdontvhavevtobput my purse on the front seat. Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Tuck

customer_reviews.title: No more handbags flying off the car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Does what I needed it to do! It fit perfectly under the passenger headrest of my Jeep Wrangler and keeps my handbag from spilling over onto the floor. The plastic seems sturdy enough to hold my moderately heavy bag. I also like that I can swing the clip around to the back side of the seat if I have a passenger in the front seat. Nice little useful gadget. I only needed one so I gave the other three to family members (good stocking stuffers!). Shipping (Prime) was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy clip!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Love the attachment for the water bottle. I always seem to have more water bottles than cupholders somehow so the attachment definitely helps. My purse is pretty heavy so I was worried at first but the clip holds up well. So easy and convenient having my purse behind the passenger seat. My sister and I would normally have our purse in our lap, sitting on the console or back seat. No more opening the back seat door just to get my purse! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luksi

customer_reviews.title: High quality, sturdy, inexpensive hanger
customer_reviews.text: These are inexpensive yet high quality. The packaging it comes in isn't anything special but the plastic is sturdy, the strap is long enough to hang straight over the seat, and the clips fit perfectly around the headrest mounts. Additionally the size of the actual clip part is perfectly sized for holding my wife's Dooney and Bourke bags and the bottle opener actually clips securely around the mouth so bottles will not fall no matter how crazy a driver you are. Ultimately, if you are looking for a good seat hanger to organize your car, you won't be disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: SRBoe

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big difference in how you feel about your car
customer_reviews.text: Who would have thought that something so simple would make my life better? Keeps my purse off the floor of the car. No longer have the problem of hitting the brakes and having my purse deposit its contents all over the passenger side floor. Is great for purses and groceries. I also keep my grocery bags attached to these so they are handy when I go INTO the store. Also hang the dog's leash on this. Overall, has done quite a bit to keep my car a little cleaner than I've been able to in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Daktari

customer_reviews.title: Love the Versatility
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are really nice because they are multifunction. Each hook includes a device to hold water bottles in addition to bags, purses, etc. I'm very glad I bought them. My only concern is the risk they may break over time, since they are plastic. Supposedly they will handle up to 13 lb of weight, so I'm assuming that, so long as I stay under that weight limit, I should be fine. I've only been using them a couple of weeks, but so far so GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Olson

customer_reviews.title: My tote no longer spills all over the car
customer_reviews.text: These car seat headrest hooks work great. My tote hangs next to me when I'm driving alone, or behind my passenger instead of in their lap. When I turn a corner I don't have to put a hand my tote so it doesn't spill. It was worth the price to resolve the constant annoyance of searching my car for my stuff that fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Ron or Ann

customer_reviews.title: Im hooked on these!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these hooks so much that I ordered them twice. I put the hooks in both my car and my husbands car. I also put them in my back cargo area. They are great for holding purses, but they are great for holding up grocery bags. I am letting people know that they need these hooks in their lives, and to definitely get them from lebogner on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L

customer_reviews.title: Great Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one set of the Car Seat Headrest Hooks and liked them so much that I purchased a second set. I carry many separate bags, one for each client, and these hooks keeps the files off the seats and floor. I also love hanging my purse on a hook, this eliminates having my purse falling on the floor if I come to a quick stop. An additional plus to these hooks it that you can hang a bottle of water from them, very handy when I have clients in the car showing property for extended periods of time. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered another of these and found them unable to securely hold a wide handled purse so they were returned. These not only securely hold purses with wide/thick handles, but a variety of other items and two or more at once. Far better than the first item I had chosen. Will get some for others in our family. Would like to see other color options, like tan/off white for light colored interiors in vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: handy headrest hooks are a winner!
customer_reviews.text: these little hooks are a handy item to have for the car. they are easy to install and they allow grocery/shopping bags to hang, rather than sitting on the seat or the floorboard - no worries about the bag tipping over. hanging up parcels out of the way also frees up the back seat so that passengers can enjoy the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda T. Allen

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these things. When I am driving alone I keep them set at the front to hang my purse on so that if I hit the brakes the purse doesn't end up on the floor board with all my stuff spilling out. But if I have a passenger, they simply swing to the back of the seat. I've had a set for a couple of years now and just bought five sets to give away as Christmas presents and stocking suffers. A friend at the office isaw them in my car and I know she ordered some this past week for her car.
customer_reviews.author: dlm

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gadgets! They hold my purse, shopping bags, and even a giant Yeti mug that has a loop at the top. Why didn't I buy these sooner, could have saved myself a few spills and stains in my car lol. The hooks are a little difficult to take items off of if you aren't paying attention (in other words don't try to remove your purse or water bottle while you're driving and not looking at the hook!) Better price than others I've seen and they seem very durable. Happy Hanging!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but bottle holders can get lost.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for holding my purse, backpacks, jackets and shopping bags. Very effective, does not damage my leather and even holds my very heavy work bag safely. I deducted 1 star because the bottle holders are not attached (I thought they flipped up and down) and come off easily. With kids constantly in and out of the car 2 of the bottle holder pieces have gone M.I.A. and they were the reason why I chose this product over another. If you don't need the bottle holders then I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best Headrest Hooks I've Found
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, so much better than the other hooks I've tried before. These hooks actually "snap" in place around the headrest post and won't fall off, they also use flexible webbing between the headrest clip the hooks which helps it contour to the seat-back better. And they included a rather ingenious clip adapter that will hold a water bottle. These cost a little more but I think they are worth it. (4-2018. These are so good I just bought a second set for a new vehicle)
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Umbrellas are now in reach and my handbag stays on the front seat...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use to hold my umbrellas in order to get them off the floor of the car and to someplace where I can reach them. I also use these to keep my handbag on the front seat when I don't have a passenger. I can easily reach my handbag if I need it and do not have to worry that it will fly off the seat while it is unzipped. I gave my husband one for his car for the umbrellas. These are a neat, easy to use item.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McW

customer_reviews.title: Love these Hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability of hanging my purse or my grocery bags on the hooks as well as the added water clip. Lesson learned. . when folding down our Jeep seats, I didn't turn the hooks to the front seat and one of the water clips broke. I wish I could get a replacement for the water bottle holder without having to purchase the whole unit. The hooks are very sturdy and I would recommend this purchase to anyone looking for headrest hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Marti F.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat back hooks for organizing and safety!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a few different hook for seatbacks. One was off of Facebook and cost close to $50 for three hooks - took over two months to get them - and they were a pile of junk and fell apart immediately. These are sturdy and I like them a lot. They keep shopping bags from rolling around and keeps my purse off the floor. I like that they have a solid sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: Marie L. Verderame

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not heavy enough to stay still when ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product but not heavy enough to stay still when removing bags. Needs to attach to back of seat somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Casner

customer_reviews.title: Self Adjusting
customer_reviews.text: The design of this product is preferred to a solid plastic design it replaced in my new Traverse. The fact that they are made of fabric webbing allows them to self adjust and fall properly along the seat back. I had to replace a stiff plastic hook due to it not fitting the seat without sticking out toward the rear seat passenger. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Todd Felter

customer_reviews.title: God Send
customer_reviews.text: These are a Godsend to bags falling over and groceries spilling out under my seats. I purchased these after having a pack of mushrooms fall unnoticed under seat for a few days. I promise you...the smell was almost impossible to get out of my car! I also use these to hang my kids backpacks on the back of seat when car riding. Easy for teachers to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Keeps purse off the floor.
customer_reviews.text: I hated putting my purse on the floor of my car especially during the winter months and I hated it when I had it on my seat and everything came flying out! I saw these on line and liked that they were flexible and a little longer than the other headrest hooks I saw. Got them last week and used it for the first time today. Is was great to have a safe spot for my bag. I also like that it can hold a water bottle. I gave one to each of my kids to help keep their cars a little more organized. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Does what is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I absoutely love when I get somehing that works. My purse has fallen off the seat more times than I can count. This gadget stops that. I have a very bad habit of not closing my bag. I always think that I will need something in my bag when I stop for a light. Well my bag is still not zipped but it does fall off the seat anymore
customer_reviews.author: Divineone

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hooks - I can't believe, after all these years, I now have a spot to hang my purse or a few bags. No longer do they slide onto the floor when I hit the breaks. No longer do I have to reach over to the passenger-side floor to pick up the stuff that would inevitably spill out of my purse or bags (and always outside of my reach, of course). The hooks are simple to install; just push the top hook onto the headrest, and viola! If someone is sitting on the passenger side, you can just turn the hook around to the back. What a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: In the short time I've had these, they work wonderfully! They are very easy to attach and I can use them on either side of the car seat. They seem very well made from heavy duty plastic. I use it on the front of the passenger seat to hang my purse so it doesn't go flying when I make a turn too quickly or have to stop suddenly. All in all, so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lori P

customer_reviews.title: I love the extra clip for regular water bottles so anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: I carry a Ozmo water bottle with me everywhere and I got tired of sitting it in the seat and if I forgot to close the top, I would spill water on the seat. This hooks to the headrest of my vehicle and the Ozmo rides with me without falling over. I love the extra clip for regular water bottles so anyone riding with me can use this to hold their bottles. The only thing to be careful is to remember to take your water bottle with you. I use the extra one to hold my umbrella. This is a very useful little hook.
customer_reviews.author: Mac P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of my purse dumping to the floor every time I hit the brake hard ; or having to put it way in the back seat if I had a front seat passenger. These work great. I actually like to be able to spin it around. If I have no passenger I leave hook hanging toward the front , but if needed, I spin it to hang in the back so it doesn't bother my seat mate. Really do like them
customer_reviews.author: Cathy McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are very handy and easy to install & remove from the headrest adjustment rods. I haven't used the beverage bottle holder adapter but it look like a workable option for those who need it. So far these hooks seem to be durable with virtually no interference and I would definitely buy more when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Rolbeck

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these clip in tightly so I'm pretty sure they will stay put. They are still easily moved around from back to front, though, if you need them to be. Each hook has two hooks. One would be limited to small items but, the other one will hold my handbag or comparable size item. The materiel seems strong and well put together. It did come with an attachment that was not explained. I put it on the bottom hook and I think it'll hold a bottle. I haven't tried it yet but, it's the only thing I could come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, works great
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I have one on passenger seat for my purse. It doesn't end up on the floor anymore when I stop! I can flip it around to the back of the seat with passenger up front. Others on the back of last row of seats for carrying my tripod case and groceries. Sturdy plastic and bottle holder rings handy if you have more bottles than cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: It holds water bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bookbags, purses, and grocery bags off the floor. And, bonus!, it holds water and soda bottles so now they are not rolling around the floor. It at least gives the appearance of trying to keep your car clean. Tip: If the hook doesn’t clip around the headrest’s bar just take the headrest off and slide the bar down through the hook. It’s actually more secure. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Myers

customer_reviews.title: pocketbook and packages fit perfect in front seat without falling!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: love these, as they are sturdy, easy to put on head rest and they swing to back of seat when passenger seat has someone in it, and swings back to front of seat when alone in car. the long mesh hanger sits long enough and up against front of seat, the two options for hanger is handy and the bottle holder. great as a gift !!!
customer_reviews.author: ann marie saccente

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this.. something i didnt know i needed but once i got it i can never not use it. i dont have to bend and pick up my lip stick or pen that keep faling out everytime i go over a bump .. it keeps my bags still. i love it
customer_reviews.author: A. Alajmi

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to keep order in the car
customer_reviews.text: Utility and best hook attachment. Some discount water bottles have gone to a smaller neck so they slid/fall through holder neck piece. Juice and soda bottle are no problem to hang while kids put on seat belts. Trash bag, grocery bags and device cords are visible and off the floorboards. Bags are hung and don't fall over to have contents spill out on seat or floors! Low cost solution for second and third row. Stayed attached even on folding seats.
customer_reviews.author: buyers2

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: So AWESOME I love these hooks. They are well made and do the job perfectly! I checked a lot of hooks before ordering these, some were made very poorly or did not fit correcly. These are EXCELLENT! I use one facing the front on passenger seat to hang my purse. Not only does it keep the seatbelt light from alarming, but my purse is easily accessable while driving!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these headrest hooks by Lebogner !
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these headrest hooks by Lebogner ! They are so strong, flexible, & great quality. I also like they each is individual, because I'd seen some that were doubles your had to hook 1 to each post of a headrest. We'll be ordering more because we have multiple vehicles & they'll make terrific gifts! Thank you Lebogner Direct for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: TNgal

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: This worked exactly like I hoped. I wanted something that could easily be used in passenger seat but moved quickly when someone is sitting there. I have a Yukon Denali and the seats are wider than most and it was long enough to reach front and rear of seat.
customer_reviews.author: luv4pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: These hooks said they were adjustable. That was important to me because I had others that weren't adjustable and with the thickness of me car seats got lost under the headrest. The straps on the ones I received were one and a half inches and sewn in place, the was no longer strap. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: HELEN

customer_reviews.title: Having my purse stay put is priceless!
customer_reviews.text: Use one for me, one for a friend and two for my daughter. Like that I can turn it to the rear of the seat when my passenger seat is occupied. Love that my purse doesn't fall onto the passenger floorboard when I have to brake quickly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: ATX Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fixes the problem of where to put things
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have one installed on my passenger seat to hold my purse when I'm driving. Holds it up nicely and keeps it from dumping on the floor when stopping. The other is towards the back of the driver seat to hold my reusable shopping bags. Very easy to install, and can easily turn the hook from front the seat to the back if I have someone sitting in the front passenger seat. I don't use the water bottle part and don't really see the point, but it's there if you want it. I didn't need all four, so gave one to family member, who also loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S/Va

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this product for very long but seems to do the job and do the job well. Installation was simply and easy. Plastic seems very study and while the bottle holder seems nice, I would imagine more and more people are using their own refillable bottles so to each his own. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for the car!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT invention and a must-have for the car! Very versatile uses - hang clothes, shopping purchase and especially my purse. Especially as a woman, I no longer have to worry about my purse ending up on the bottom of the car floor. Nice option to have the water bottle holder attachment. I highly recommend these hooks and will give to my girlfriends as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Doxxies

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Something so simple yet so useful. I don't often have passengers in the front seat of my car anymore but my purse is a constant. There are times when I may have to slam on the brakes or make a sharp turn and there goes my purse on the floor! but thanks to these hooks, no more. I hang my straps on the hooks and voila! I even hang small bags on them on well...these hooks are a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Peepchick

customer_reviews.title: Cool hooks!!
customer_reviews.text: These little hooks are perfect for our car. I can hang my purse and my young girls can hang their school bags and lunch bags on them on our way to school. This makes grabbing them at drop off time so much easier than having to fumble with them trying to pick them up from off of the floor. Very easy to attach and sturdy. And I like that there’s a small attachment piece that allows it to carry a beverage bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S. George

customer_reviews.title: No more purse in the way!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son would always complain about my purse being in the way on the front seat or anywhere in the front of the car. This product silenced them, and I must say me as well! Now I have a place to hang my purse, work bag, and even drinks with the attachment for bottles. Some of the others I compared with were a piece of plastic, not very attractive if that matters to you. These hooks look nice, hang flat, and are easy to put on and take off. The 4 pack is perfect - 2 for each vehicle. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MrBiscuit

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: These car hooks are genius ! Very handy to keep bags from rolling around in the car. I also love the added ability to hang a bottle. So far every bottle I tried fit perfectly. You can't go wrong here. You can swing them around from the front to the back. If I am driving alone, I can hang my purse on the passenger seat. If I have a passenger in the front seat, I just swing them to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie KO

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I am so tired of trying to find a spot for my purse when the floor is covered with snow and slush and muck. Even when it is on the passenger seat, one sharp brake and down onto the wet floor it goes. ANNOYING. These hooks swing easily from front seat to back seat, keeping purses off the floor but still within reach. Genius! I have a Toyota Sequoia (aka big car) and the hooks fit easily and reach a good hanging height. After about a week of use, I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Momma

customer_reviews.title: Hooks
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks! They hold my super heavy purse no problem. No more purse on the floor when someone is in the passenger seat. They are also great to help grocery bags not fly around my back seat. And my kids hang their backpacks on them too. Such a simple solution that takes up zero room in my car.
customer_reviews.author: JanineMH

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things you don't know you need, until you have it. Hook it to your headrest and put on the front or back of your seat to hang grocery bags, umbrella, hats, water bottle, etc. Keep things from falling on the floor. We bought the four pack and put one in each car.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Earlier this year I put my purse on the floor behind the driver's seat. It tipped over and my expensive eye drops rolled under my seat and into a vent. I tried to get them out but couldn't - so I went to the dealership and they told me they need to take the driver's seat out to get to the vent to get them out - very expensive! Now - I don't have to worry about that anymore - I just hang my purse on the hook and everything is where I need it to be. I bought some for my daughter too - she is going to love them!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Need more order in your busy life?  These hooks get you one step closer!
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are a great way to keep backpacks, totes, purses, and pocketbooks right where you want them during your commute or road trip! The hooks are very sturdy and have been tested by my larger mom's purse that holds everyone's stuff. Additionally, they keep necessary items within arms' reach -- a much-needed solution when retrieving something while at a traffic light. The added functionality of the water bottle attachment is a brilliant bonus. I haven't used it yet, but appreciate the thoughtful addition. I bought two sets -- one for my car and one for my daughter's car. So glad I can use these not matter what vehicle I happen to be in.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps from making a mess.
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought them for Christmas presents, but have one extra for my car. I love it because sometimes get in a hurry and don't zip by purse shut. It seems then I hit the brakes and my purse dumps on the floor with everything falling out. Now I hand my purse on the passage side of my front seat. Easy to reach and no more spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they keep my purse off the floor and from sliding around so I have to search around for it in the back seat. The bottle holders are a nice extra feature but I use reusable water bottles so I can’t speak to their effectiveness. I do wish the straps were a little stiffer, they bend and move when I’m trying to hang
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: No More Spilled Purse on the Floor
customer_reviews.text: I have a small car and carry a designer bag most days so keeping it off of the floor is very important to me. I placed 2 headrest hooks facing the front on the passenger seat and 2 facing back on the driver’s seat. If I’m in the car by myself I can easily get into my bag in the front seat. If someone else is in the car, I just swing the hooks around to the back for her bag and hang my bag on the back of the driver’s seat. I’m going to purchase these for my other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Spangler

product_meta.title: lebogner 4 Pack Car Seat Headrest Hooks Strong and Durable Backseat Headrest Hanger Storage for Handbags, Purses, Coats, and Grocery Bags, Universal Vehicle Car Seat Back Headrest Bottle Holder
product_meta.description:
Would you like to sit comfortably while you are traveling and reach your stuff at any convenient moment?
Do you want your car to be more neat and organized?
Need a place to put your grocery bags, and would like to convert your seat headrest into space?

 The Lebogner Car Seat Headrest Hooks is the answer!!!

The Car Seat Headrest Hooks is the most affordable and solid car accessory, It’s specially designed to hang groceries, clothes, umbrella, handbags, water bottles, kid's toys, baby supplies and much more.
This is one of the best ways to prevent rolling around and spilling your bags in the back of the car.

Benefits Of Buying The LEBOGNER Car Seat Headrest Hooks…

★ Customized design fits on the Seat Headrest of Most Vehicles.
★ Constructed out of premium quality material that each can hold up to 13 lb (6 kg).
★ Includes a BONUS bottle holder part for each hook to add on the bottom hook to turn it into a bottle holder.
★ Hook converts your car's headrest into a convenient storage space.
★ Hook can easily swing around so it can be used for the front or back of the seat.
★ It’s easy to remove when not in need or changing to another car.
★ Easy And Convenient To Use.
★ 100% NO HASSLE Lifetime Guarantee - NO RISK TO YOU!
★ Hook installs easy with the side opening design so you will not need to dissemble the headrest.

Hurry! Keep Your Car Organized And Make Your Life Easier By Adding This Amazing Lebogner Car Seat Headrest Hooks To Your Cart Today!

Satisfaction Is 100% Guaranteed Or Your Money Back.
feature_bullets: ✓ ★ A MUST HAVE ★ This CAR SEAT HEADREST HOOKS Is Great To Keep Your Car Organized For An Enjoyable Ride. No More Leaving Your House or Store With Shopping Bags and Placing It On The Floor or Seat Rolling Around and Spilling, Our Headrest Hooks will keep it Organized. Easy And Convenient To Use.

✓ Our Car Seat Headrest Hook converts your car's headrest into a convenient storage space to hang Groceries, Clothes, Umbrella, Handbags, Water Bottles, Kids Toys, Baby Supplies and Much More. Our Hanger fits almost every Car, SUV, Van, Truck, headrest.

✓ Our Seat Headrest Hooks Comes in a 4 PACK and is constructed out of premium quality material that each can hold up to 13 lb (6 kg), The Hooks will definitely organize your back seat clutter and will give you Seat, Floor and Leg room. It also includes a BONUS bottle holder part for each hook to add on the bottom hook to turn it into a bottle holder.

✓ Our Seat Headrest Hook installs easy with the side opening design so you will not need to dissemble the headrest, Also the hook can easily swing around so it can be used for the front or back of the seat. It’s also easy to remove when not in need or changing to another car.
✓ Buy It Now With Confidence, This Best ★ TOP QUALITY CAR SEAT HEADREST HOOK ★ Will Keep Your Car Organized 100% and We Guarantee Satisfaction With a 100% Lifetime Money Back Guarantee.
